title: Topple HD Watch Face
summary: Topple is a radiant watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch

Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Topple Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A11

Category
Decent

Product description

Topple Watch Face is exceptional watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features


 smooth/tick needles
 5 custom colors
 square & round watches support
 date
 Collection of ambient modes

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:

 smooth/tick needles
 5 custom colors
 square & round watches support
 date
 Collection of ambient modes
Configuration:
 switch needle style smooth & tick
 pick your favorite background color
 pick your favorite ambient mode
For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Topple Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Stop asking me over to rate your app Even after saying I don't want to rate your app, it keeps asking over and over.  1 star for forcing a rating.
Doesn't work EVER! Unfortunately toggle has stopped. Every time.
